languages.text: {n}Арджента снова смеривает вас взглядом. В темных глубинах ее глаз читается что-то странное, какая-то борьба, или невысказанный вопрос. Но в конце концов она кивает.{/n} "Это темный и страшный час. Корабль полнится скверной. На лицах друзей проступают усмешки еретиков, в глазах товарищей вспыхивает голод {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Я сделаю то что должно, чтобы остановить поступь темных сил, но в эти мрачные мгновения верить нельзя ничему. Потому я должна знать — зачем вы здесь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента снова смеривает вас взглядом. В темных глубинах ее глаз читается что-то странное, какая-то борьба, или невысказанный вопрос. Но в конце концов она кивает.{/n} "Это темный и страшный час. Корабль полнится скверной. На лицах друзей проступают усмешки еретиков, в глазах товарищей вспыхивает голод {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Я встану плечом к плечу со всяким, кто готов остановить поступь темных сил. Ведь за этим вы здесь?"

languages.text: {n}Argenta gives you another stern appraisal. You catch something strange in the dark depths of her eyes, some internal struggle or a wordless question. In the end, however, she nods.{/n} "The hour is dark and daunting. The ship abounds with corruption. The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades ignite with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s hunger. I will do what I must to halt the advance of the dark forces, but in these dire moments little can be trusted. So I must know, why are you here?"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента снова смеривает вас взглядом. В темных глубинах ее глаз читается что-то странное, какая-то борьба, или невысказанный вопрос. Но в конце концов она кивает.{/n} "Это темный и страшный час. Корабль полнится скверной. На лицах друзей проступают усмешки еретиков, в глазах товарищей вспыхивает голод {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Я сделаю то что должно, чтобы остановить поступь темных сил, но в эти мрачные мгновения верить нельзя ничему. Потому я должна знать — зачем вы здесь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta gives you another stern look. You catch something strange in the dark depths of her eyes, some internal struggle or a wordless question. In the end, however, she nods.{/n} "The hour is dark and daunting. The ship abounds with corruption. The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades are igniting with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s hunger. I will stand shoulder to shoulder with anyone willing to halt the advance of the dark forces. That is why you have come, isn't it?"

{n}Argenta gives you another stern look. You catch something strange in the dark depths of her eyes, some internal struggle or a wordless question. In the end, however, she nods.{/n} "The hour is dark and daunting. The ship abounds with corruption. The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades are igniting with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s hunger. I will stand shoulder to shoulder with anyone willing to halt the advance of the dark forces. That is why you have come, isn't it?"

The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades are igniting with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s hunger. I will stand shoulder to shoulder with anyone willing to halt the advance of the dark forces. That is why you have come, isn't it?"

I will stand shoulder to shoulder with anyone willing to halt the advance of the dark forces. That is why you have come, isn't it?"

{n}Argenta gives you another stern appraisal. You catch something strange in the dark depths of her eyes, some internal struggle or a wordless question. In the end, however, she nods.{/n} "The hour is dark and daunting. The ship abounds with corruption. The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades ignite with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s hunger. I will do what I must to halt the advance of the dark forces, but in these dire moments little can be trusted. So I must know, why are you here?"

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔再次严肃地看着你。你在她的黑眼睛深处捕捉到了某些古怪的东西，仿佛是内心的挣扎或无言的疑问。但到了最后，她还是点了点头。{/n}“这个时代充满了黑暗与恐怖。这艘船上充斥着腐化，朋友们的笑脸被异端分子的嗤笑所扭曲，而战友们的双眼也被{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的饥渴所点燃。我打算尽我所能，阻止邪恶的力量继续蔓延。然而，在这危急时刻，几乎没有任何人可以信任。因此我必须了解一下，你为什么会出现在这里？”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta gives you another stern appraisal. You catch something strange in the dark depths of her eyes, some internal struggle or a wordless question. In the end, however, she nods.{/n} "The hour is dark and daunting. The ship abounds with corruption. The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades ignite with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s hunger. I will do what I must to halt the advance of the dark forces, but in these dire moments little can be trusted. So I must know, why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔再次严肃你看着你。你在她的黑眼睛深处捕捉到了某些古怪的东西，仿佛是内心的挣扎或无言的疑问。但到了最后，她还是点了点头。{/n}“这个时代充满了黑暗与恐怖。这艘船上充斥着腐化，朋友们的笑脸被异端分子的嗤笑所扭曲，而战友们的双眼也被{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的饥渴所点燃。无论是谁，只要他们愿意阻止黑暗势力继续扩张，我就愿意与那些人并肩作战。你之所以来这里，正是为了这个目的，没错吧？”

languages.text: {n}Argenta te examina al detalle de nuevo. Te parece ver algo extraño en las oscuras profundidades de sus ojos; algún tipo de conflicto interno o pregunta acallada. Al final, no obstante, se contenta con asentir.{/n} «Es un momento oscuro y abrumador. La nave está llena de corrupción. Las caras de nuestros amigos están retorcidas por las muecas de la herejía, los ojos de nuestros camaradas arden con el hambre del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. Haré lo que deba para detener el avance de las fuerzas del mal. Pero en momentos como este, confiar a ciegas es peligroso. Por eso debo preguntar: ¿qué les trae aquí?».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta gives you another stern appraisal. You catch something strange in the dark depths of her eyes, some internal struggle or a wordless question. In the end, however, she nods.{/n} "The hour is dark and daunting. The ship abounds with corruption. The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades ignite with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s hunger. I will do what I must to halt the advance of the dark forces, but in these dire moments little can be trusted. So I must know, why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta te examina al detalle de nuevo. Te parece ver algo extraño en las oscuras profundidades de sus ojos; algún tipo de conflicto interno o pregunta acallada. Al final, no obstante, se contenta con asentir.{/n} «Es un momento oscuro y abrumador. La nave está llena de corrupción. Las caras de nuestros amigos están retorcidas por las muecas de la herejía, los ojos de nuestros camaradas arden con el hambre del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. Lucharé hombro con hombro con todo aquel que esté dispuesto a detener el avance de las fuerzas del mal. Por eso están aquí, ¿no es así?».

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタはあなたに再び厳しい評価を下す。あなたは彼女の瞳の奥底に何か奇妙なもの、心の葛藤か口に出さない質問を感じる。しかし、最終的には彼女はうなずいた。{/n}「時は暗く、極めて重い。船には腐敗が広がり、友人たちの顔は異端の嘲笑に歪み、同志たちの目は{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の飢えに燃えています。闇の勢力の進行を阻止するために我は戦うが、こういう切迫した状況では誰も信用できません。だから教えてほしいのです。なぜ、あなたはここに？」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta gives you another stern appraisal. You catch something strange in the dark depths of her eyes, some internal struggle or a wordless question. In the end, however, she nods.{/n} "The hour is dark and daunting. The ship abounds with corruption. The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades ignite with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s hunger. I will do what I must to halt the advance of the dark forces, but in these dire moments little can be trusted. So I must know, why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタはあなたに再び厳しい評価を下す。あなたは彼女の瞳の奥底に何か奇妙なもの、心の葛藤か口に出さない質問を感じる。 しかし、最終的には彼女はうなずいた。{/n}「時は暗く、極めて重い。船には汚職が蔓延し、友人たちの顔は異端者の嘲笑に歪み、同志たちの目は{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}宿敵{/g}の飢えに発火している。私は闇の勢力の進行を阻止しようとする者と肩を並べて立ち上がる。あなたはそのために来たのでしょう？」

{n}アルジェンタはあなたに再び厳しい評価を下す。あなたは彼女の瞳の奥底に何か奇妙なもの、心の葛藤か口に出さない質問を感じる。しかし、最終的には彼女はうなずいた。{/n}「時は暗く、極めて重い。船には腐敗が広がり、友人たちの顔は異端の嘲笑に歪み、同志たちの目は{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の飢えに燃えています。闇の勢力の進行を阻止するために我は戦うが、こういう切迫した状況では誰も信用できません。だから教えてほしいのです。なぜ、あなたはここに？」

languages.original_text: {n}Argenta gives you another stern appraisal. You catch something strange in the dark depths of her eyes, some internal struggle or a wordless question. In the end, however, she nods.{/n} "The hour is dark and daunting. The ship abounds with corruption. The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades ignite with the Archenemy's hunger. I will do what I must to halt the advance of the dark forces, but in these dire moments little can be trusted. So I must know, why are you here?"

languages.text: {n}Argenta vous observe à nouveau des pieds à la tête. Vous remarquez une lueur étrange dans le noir de ses yeux, comme une lutte intérieure ou une question inexprimée. Mais pour finir, elle se contente d'acquiescer.{/n} « L'heure est grave et inquiétante. Le vaisseau est en proie à la corruption. Les rictus de l'hérésie tordent les visages de nos amis, la faim du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} embrase les yeux de nos camarades. Je ferai le nécessaire pour entraver l'avancée des forces occultes, mais en ces temps de crise, on ne peut avoir confiance en rien ni personne. Rassurez-moi, c'est bien pour cela que vous êtes ici ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta gives you another stern appraisal. You catch something strange in the dark depths of her eyes, some internal struggle or a wordless question. In the end, however, she nods.{/n} "The hour is dark and daunting. The ship abounds with corruption. The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades ignite with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s hunger. I will do what I must to halt the advance of the dark forces, but in these dire moments little can be trusted. So I must know, why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta vous observe à nouveau des pieds à la tête. Vous remarquez une lueur étrange dans le noir de ses yeux, comme une lutte intérieure ou une question inexprimée. Mais pour finir, elle se contente d'acquiescer.{/n} « L'heure est grave et inquiétante. Le vaisseau est en proie à la corruption. Les rictus de l'hérésie tordent les visages de nos amis, la faim du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} embrase les yeux de nos camarades. Je combattrai aux côtés de quiconque sera prêt à entraver l'avancée des forces des ténèbres. C'est bien pour ça que vous êtes ici, je me trompe ? »

languages.text: {n}Argenta mustert dich erneut mit ernster Miene. Du bemerkst etwas Merkwürdiges in den dunklen Tiefen ihrer Augen, wie ein innerer Widerstreit oder eine wortlose Frage. Am Ende nickt sie allerdings.{/n} "Eine dunkle und beunruhigende Stunde. Das Schiff ist voller Verderbnis. Die Gesichter von Freunden sind verzerrt vom Hohn der Ketzerei, in den Augen der Kameraden brennt der Hunger des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g}. Ich werde tun, was ich tun muss, um den Vormarsch der dunklen Kräfte Einhalt zu gebieten, aber in diesen dunklen Momenten kann niemandem vertrauen. Ich muss also wissen, warum seid Ihr hier?"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta gives you another stern appraisal. You catch something strange in the dark depths of her eyes, some internal struggle or a wordless question. In the end, however, she nods.{/n} "The hour is dark and daunting. The ship abounds with corruption. The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades ignite with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s hunger. I will do what I must to halt the advance of the dark forces, but in these dire moments little can be trusted. So I must know, why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta mustert dich erneut mit ernster Miene. Du bemerkst etwas Merkwürdiges in den dunklen Tiefen ihrer Augen, wie ein innerer Widerstreit oder eine wortlose Frage. Am Ende jedoch nickt sie.{/n} "Eine dunkle und beunruhigende Stunde. Das Schiff ist voller Verderbnis. Die Gesichter von Freunden sind verzerrt vom Hohn der Ketzerei, in den Augen der Kameraden brennt der Hunger des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g}. Ich werde Schulter an Schulter mit allen stehen, die gewillt sind, dem Vormarsch der dunklen Kräfte Einhalt zu gebieten. Deshalb seid Ihr doch gekommen, oder nicht?"

languages.text: {n}Argenta, haşin bakışlarıyla seni tekrar tartıyor. Gözlerinin kara derinlerinde tuhaf bir şey seziyorsun. Sanki içinde bir yerlerde bir mücadele veriyor ya da kelimelere dökemediği bir sorusu varmış gibi. Derken pes edip başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Karanlığa gömüldüğümüz, belki de cesaretimizin kırıldığı vakittir bu. Yozlaşmışlık gemiyi sarmış. Dostlarımızın simalarına kâfirce sırıtışlar yerleşmiş. Yoldaşlarımızın gözlerindeki ateş, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} açlığıyla harlanmış. Karanlık güçlerin önüne geçmek için gereken neyse yaparım lakin böylesi vahim anlarda birine güvenmek zor. Hakikati bilmeliyim. Neden buradasın?"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta gives you another stern appraisal. You catch something strange in the dark depths of her eyes, some internal struggle or a wordless question. In the end, however, she nods.{/n} "The hour is dark and daunting. The ship abounds with corruption. The faces of friends are twisted by sneers of heresy, the eyes of comrades ignite with the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s hunger. I will do what I must to halt the advance of the dark forces, but in these dire moments little can be trusted. So I must know, why are you here?"

Sanki içinde bir yerlerde bir mücadele veriyor ya da kelimelere dökemediği bir sorusu varmış gibi. Derken pes edip başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Karanlığa gömüldüğümüz, belki de cesaretimizin kırıldığı vakittir bu. Yozlaşmışlık gemiyi sarmış. Dostlarımızın simalarına kâfirce sırıtışlar yerleşmiş. Yoldaşlarımızın gözlerindeki ateş, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın açlığıyla harlanmış. Karanlık güçlerin önüne geçmek için gereken neyse yaparım lakin böylesi vahim anlarda birine güvenmek zor. Hakikati bilmeliyim. Neden buradasın?"
